about_the_game:
This is a leisure and entertainment game. Players need to wash and take care of the feet of girls who are tired in the hot summer to relieve the fatigue of the girls. After serving the first girl, we will also unlock the way to customize the girl. Players can customize a girl they like and provide foot services for her to relieve fatigue and let the girl sleep comfortably.

Instructions:
W. a. s. d Move, the left mouse button interacts with ui, drag the mouse to rotate the field of view;

content_descriptors.notes:
When players change clothes for the lady avatar, some clothes may look very short. 
There is a bikini clothes set.

detailed_description:
This is a leisure and entertainment game. Players need to wash and take care of the feet of girls who are tired in the hot summer to relieve the fatigue of the girls. After serving the first girl, we will also unlock the way to customize the girl. Players can customize a girl they like and provide foot services for her to relieve fatigue and let the girl sleep comfortably.

Instructions:
W. a. s. d Move, the left mouse button interacts with ui, drag the mouse to rotate the field of view;
name: Foot washing and massage for DIY girls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 3000 or above
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: Celeron 1.5(1.5G) or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX450,AMD HD7870,512 MB VRAM or above
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: This is a leisure and entertainment game. Players need to wash and take care of the feet of girls who are tired in the hot summer to relieve the fatigue of the girls.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Arabic, Korean
